contentList.content: You achieve unparalleled mastery with your weapons, seamlessly merging them into an extension of your being.
Gain the effects of Fighting Style: Two-Weapon Fighting.
Perform two weapon attacks in quick succession. Can only be used wielding a weapon in each hand.
Infuse your melee weapons to deal an additional [1] damage with a chosen damage type.
Gain the effects of Extra Attack.
Strike all nearby creatures with your blades.
Through disciplined training of mind, body, and spirit, ascetic mystics can perform both devastating psionics and crushing blows.

Your unarmed attacks deal [1], and you use your Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> for unarmed attack and damage rolls. Additionally, you can make an unarmed attack as a bonus action.
After spending Psi Points, gain stacks of Psionic Resonance, increasing the damage of your next successful unarmed attack by [1] per stack.
Next unarmed attack will deal an additional [1].
After casting a psionic discipline, you can make an unarmed strike for free. Once per turn.
Able to make an unarmed strike for free.
At the start of each combat, regain [1] Psi Points.
Also known as Blades, mystics of this order forsake mental training and instead focus on weapons, using their psionics to enhance their attacks.
Learn a Fighting Style of your choice.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Weapon Proficiency</LSTag> with Martial Weapons and <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Medium Armour, Heavy Armour and Shields.

When wielding a weapon that matches your chosen Fighting Style from Mystic Arsenal, you use your Intelligence Modifier for attack and damage rolls. Additionally, gain an additional ability based on the Fighting Style chosen from Mystic Arsenal.

- Great Weapon Fighting: Psychic Smite
- Dueling: Psychic Flourish
- Archery: Psychic Barrage
- Thrown Weapon Fighting: Psychic Shockwave
This weapon uses the wielder's Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> for <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Deliver a crushing slam infused with psi.
Strike foes in an arc and gain [1] increased <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> and increasing your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by [2] until your next turn.
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> increased by [1]. <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> increased by [2].
Shoot up to [1] times. Each shot deals half damage.
Unleash a psychic shockwave in a targeted area.

Enter a state of heightened psionic focus. You gain the benefits of <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack_2">Improved Extra Attack</LSTag>, [1] increased <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> and a bonus to weapon attack and damage rolls equal to your Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
Able to attack three times. [1] increased movement speed. +[2] to weapon attack and damage rolls.
You learn to manipulate the fundamental forces that hold things together, granting you a semblance of control over gravity.
Channel gravitational energy onto a creature, possibly knocking it <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Alter a creature's gravity, modifying their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>, jumping distance and fall damage taken.
Reduce a creature's gravity, increasing their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1], jumping distance by [2] and negating fall damage.
Increase a creature's gravity, reducing their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1], jumping distance by [2] and increasing fall damage by [3] times.
Experiencing reduced gravity. <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> increased by [1], jumping distance increased by [2] and fall damage negated.
Experiencing increased gravity. <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> reduced by [1], jumping distance reduced by [2] and fall damage is increased by [3] times.
Exert a powerful gravitational force in a targeted area. Creatures within have their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> halved.

Warp space around a friendly creature, turning them into a gravitational beacon. Enemies within [1] take [2] per turn, are pulled inwards and their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is halved.

Turned into a miniature black hole.

Enemies within [1] take [2] per turn, are pulled inwards and their movement speed is halved.

On a successful save, targets still take half damage.

Suffering from an immense gravitational pull.

Takes [1] per turn, is pulled towards the source and movement speed is halved.

Still takes half damage on successful Saving Throw.

Removed upon leaving the area.
Compress and distort space around an area, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLOW">Slowing</LSTag> creatures within.
You reach out with your mind and grasp the threads of time themselves, allowing you to bend reality and fate to your whims.

Target yourself or an ally to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HASTE">Hastened</LSTag>: gain an action, become faster and gain +2 to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>. You become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HASTE_LETHARGY">Lethargic</LSTag> for one turn afterwards.

Creature has a +2 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, its <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is doubled, and it can take one additional action per turn.
When this condition ends, the affected creature becomes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HASTE_LETHARGY">Lethargic</LSTag>.

Nudge fate in a creature's favour, giving them Advantage on Saving Throws and imposing Disadvantage on incoming attacks.

When a spell or effect would deal half damage on a successful Dexterity Saving Throw, it deals no damage if the target succeeds, and only half damage they fail.

Once affected, a creature will become immune to this effect for 1 turn.

Advantage on Saving Throws. Incoming attacks have Disadvantage.

When a spell or effect would deal half damage on a successful Dexterity Saving Throw, it deals no damage on success, and only half damage on fail.
Affected entity can't receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MYSTIC_TWIST_OF_FATE">Twist of Fate</LSTag>.
When an enemy attacks a nearby ally, impose <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on the <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BANISHED">Banish</LSTag> a creature from the timeline.

Banished from the timeline.

Can't be targeted. Can't move or take actions, bonus actions, or reactions.

Ward a creature from harm, storing damage taken. When this spell ends, they will regain hit points equal to the damage stored.

This spell will automatically end if the creature reaches [1]. Affected creatures can choose to prematurely end this spell on their turn.
Storing damage taken. When this effect ends or when reduced to [1], regain hit points equal to the damage stored.
End the Chronoward condition on yourself.
Create a zone in which time moves faster: creatures within are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MYSTIC_BORROWED_TIME_HASTE">Hastened</LSTag>.
Materialized a zone in which creatures are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MYSTIC_BORROWED_TIME_HASTE">Hastened</LSTag> while inside.
You cast your mind into the wilderness, enhancing your ability to track and strike down your prey.
Mark a creature as your quarry to deal an additional [1] whenever you damage it.
Affected entity suffers an additional [1] if the spellcaster damages it.
When this creature damages its quarry, it deals an additional [1].
If the target dies before the spell ends, you can mark a new creature without expending Psi Points.
When you attack your quarry, you deal an additional [1].
Shift your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MYSTIC_NOMADS_MARK">Nomad's Mark</LSTag> to a new creature without using Psi Points.
Can use a bonus action to reapply Nomad's Mark to another target.

Heighten your and nearby allies' senses: gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against a target if one of your allies is within [1] of the target and isn't Incapacitated.

Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against a target if one of its allies is within [1] of the target and isn't Incapacitated.
You focus your mind on peace and serenity, bringing relaxation and rest to nearby creatures.

Gain immunity to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEP">Sleep</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysed</LSTag>.

Immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEP">Sleep</LSTag>. <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysed</LSTag>.
Induce <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEP">sleep</LSTag> onto creatures. Select targets up to a combined [1].
Appease a creature, removing and preventing any <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, or enraged effects.
Can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, and can't <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Rage">Rage</LSTag>.
Exert an aura of peace. Nearby allies regain [1] each turn
At the end of each of their turns, allies regain [1].
At the end of your turn, regain [1].
Place an allied creature in restful sleep, granting them the benefits of a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.

Wake all nearby creatures from sleep. Allies receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MYSTIC_LUCID_DREAMING">Lucid Dreaming</LSTag> and enemies receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MYSTIC_SLEEP_PARALYSIS">Sleep Paralysis</LSTag>.
+[1] to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Movement speed increased by [2].
Release tranquilizing energy in an area, putting creatures to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEP">Sleep</LSTag>.
You wield psionic energy to alter and distort reality, creating optical illusions that distract foes.
Gain immunity against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>
You learn to psionically manipulate blood, siphoning the life force from foes and strengthening yourself and allies.
You channel psychic energy around yourself and outwards, bursting into a titanic rage and controlling the battlefield.
Gain immunity against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> or falling <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Immune to being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> or falling <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
You psioncally reach out to the souls of other creatures, allowing you to rip it from their bodies, delivering a swift end.
Reducing a creature to [1] heals you for [2].
When you reduce a creature to [1], you regain [2].
You have learned to suppress all emotions on creatures, filling them with a sense of apathy and disinterest.
Gain immunity against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.
Immune against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="Charmed">Charmed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.
Unleash a wave of apathy on up to [1] creatures. Targets suffer <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
You imbue your weapons with the essence of the winds, delivering elegant yet deadly techniques upon your foes.
TODO: Blessing of Fair Winds Description
TODO: Blessing of Fair Winds (Melee) Description
TODO: Blessing of Fair Winds (Melee) Status Description
TODO: Blessing of Fair Winds (Ranged) Description
TODO: Blessing of Fair Winds (Ranged) Status Description
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> increased by [1]. Moving doesn't trigger <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Recently struck by Steel Tempest. Cannot be targeted by Steel Tempest again until the current sequence is concluded.
TODO: Steel Tempest: Second Strike Description
TODO: Steel Tempest: Second Strike Status Description
TODO: Steel Tempest: Final Strike Description
TODO: Steel Tempest: Final Strike Status Description
Your mind reaches out into the stars, granting you control over astral bodies.
Hurl a mote of starlight. The next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> on this target has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
The next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> made against this creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Shine the light of the moon around you. Enemies will turn visible and will not be able to go Invisible.
Shedding dim light. Cannot be Invisible.

Create a massive solar explosion, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinding</LSTag> creatures caught in the blast. Creatures that are sensitive to sunlight take an additional [1] and have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on this <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Materialize a path of stardust. Creatures traversing along the path can move without using their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>, but cannot act.
Can move without using <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>, but unable to act.
A violent storm of stars batter everyone in range, make the area <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>, while revealing any invisible creatures inside.
You attune yourself with the environment, allowing you to invoke the power of nature to your aid.
You tap into your own pride and confidence, lifting your allies' spirits and making your foes stumble carelessly.
TODO: Aura of Contempt Status Description
You wield your psionic power to summon spectral appendages, enhancing your and allies' effectiveness in various ways.
Reduce the number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking by 1.
The number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking is reduced by 1.
You learn to use psionic energy to break the minds of others, causing them to descend into madness.
Gain immunity against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CONFUSION">Confused</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DOMINATE_PERSON">Dominated</LSTag>.
Immune to being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CONFUSION">Confused</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DOMINATE_PERSON">Dominated</LSTag>.
You concentrate your mind on trickery and cunning, allowing you to deceive and swindle others with ease.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Sleight of Hand <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
<LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Sleight of Hand <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
